sentences.en: {"GLOSS":["when someone drinks too much"],"COLLOINEXA":["alcohol abuse"]}
sentences.cn: 酗酒

sentences.en: alcohol abuse
sentences.cn: 酗酒

sentences.en: Alcohol acts as a diuretic, making you even more dehydrated.
sentences.cn: 酒起着利尿剂的作用，会使你更加脱水。

sentences.en: Alcohol is a potent drug that anaesthetizes the brain.
sentences.cn: 酒精是一种能麻醉大脑的烈性药物。

sentences.en: Do either of you smoke cigarettes or drink alcohol?
sentences.cn: 你们俩有人吸烟或喝酒吗？

sentences.en: He was arrested on suspicion of driving under the influence of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 他因涉嫌酒后驾驶被捕。

sentences.en: He was too high on drugs and alcohol to remember them.
sentences.cn: 他吸毒酗酒后处于极度兴奋状态，已经记不得他们了。

sentences.en: I don’t drink alcohol anymore.
sentences.cn: 我不再喝酒了。

sentences.en: In 1985, he began to show signs of alcohol and drug dependency.
sentences.cn: 在1985年，他开始表现出酗酒嗜毒的迹象。

sentences.en: It is becoming more acceptable for women to drink alcohol.
sentences.cn: 女性喝酒渐渐被人们接受。

sentences.en: It would be wiser to cut out all alcohol during pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 在怀孕期间最好滴酒不沾。

sentences.en: low alcohol drinks
sentences.cn: 低度酒

sentences.en: Many motor accidents are the result of unthinkingly mixing speed and alcohol.
sentences.cn: 许多机动车事故都是不计后果地酒后开快车造成的。

sentences.en: Many suffered from a definable alcohol, drug, or mental disorder.
sentences.cn: 许多人都患有能够辨识的酗酒、吸毒或心理障碍。

sentences.en: Our spirits rallied as the bitter-sweet alcohol worked its magic.
sentences.cn: 苦中带甜的酒发挥了奇效，我们的精神随之振奋起来。

sentences.en: people with alcohol problems
sentences.cn: 有酗酒问题的人

sentences.en: Products for dry skin have little or no alcohol.
sentences.cn: 用于干性皮肤的产品含酒精较少或不含酒精。

sentences.en: There was an overpowering smell of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 有一股刺鼻的酒味。

sentences.en: Underage youths can obtain alcohol from their older friends.
sentences.cn: 未到法定年龄的青少年可以从年龄较大的朋友那里弄到酒。

sentences.en: Your intake of alcohol should not exceed two units per day.
sentences.cn: 每天的饮酒量不应超过两个计量单位。

words.tran_cn: 酗酒；[内科] 酒精中毒
醇化；变成酒精；浸渍酒精中

phrases.tran_cn: 脂肪醇；脂肪族醇；高级醇

trans.tran_cn: 含酒精的饮品，酒，酒精，乙醇
trans.tran_en: drinks such as beer or wine that contain a substance which can make you drunk
